title: Patch update stuck
body: Getting real sick of this shit, generally stuck on 33% has made it upto 40% before being stuck on 0kbps again. Tried leaving it over night & still nothing. Gone through and done every single thing thats under player support and still nothing. Tried browsing through forums or whatever no real answers either, is anyone else having this problem with the new patch? Anyone got any solutions either would be much appreciated.

replies.body:
Getting the exact same problem, and I have tried many, many things (DNS, ISP change, admin mode/disable UAC, reinstall/download)

Seems like nothing sort of just getting a new computer will fix this.

Look man I went down to a friends place and his patch installed just fine. Copy and place it onto a USB and delete all of your Riot Games files from your c drive or wherever you put it and replace it with the ones you have obtained from a friend. It worked from me, a lot cheaper than buying a new PC!

I was actually gonna do that.

But man, I don't wanna have to go across a few suburbs every time League is patched.
